Description:
Detects SharpLdapWhoami, a whoami alternative that queries the LDAP service on a domain controller

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - SharpLdapWhoami Execution
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((original_file_name like '%sharpldapwhoami%' and product = 'sharpldapwhoami') or (command like '% /method:ntlm' or command like '% /method:kerb' or command like '% /method:nego' or command like '% /m:nego' or command like '% /m:ntlm' or command like '% /m:kerb') or process_path like '%\sharpldapwhoami.exe')
